title: Claude Monet Water Lilies Reversible Rain Cape
description:
Reversible Rain Cape developed from Claude Monet’s Water Lilies, 1906, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Our Monet Water Lilies reversible rain cape is pack-able, rainproof, windproof and lightweight.  Hidden double-sided magnets to prevent sleeves from billowing during windy conditions.  Rain cape can fold up into a travel pouch with snap-on strap for your tote, car, briefcase or travel bag.  One size fits most; two shell buttons for adjustable fit. Reverses to blue.

  • Size: One size fits most.
  • Dimensions: Shoulder to wrist: 23 x 55 in., Neckline to back hem: 30 in.
  • Materials: 100% polyester
  • Machine Wash Gentle Cycle, Hang Dry.
